descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#ffff00]Narmwald - Goldbrand Reborn Eng/Rus v1.0[/color][/size][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]

[/color][color=#ffff00]Credits:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, music, location design.
9RedMen - exterior navmesh building.
AlexTirex - script consultation.

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds a legendary Goldbrand sword from earlier TES games. It can be obtained in Narmwald - new Nordic dwelling southwest from Morthal. Make your way through ancient underground, [/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]defeat a mob of dangerous bandits and pull out the precious artifact from the hands of their leader.

[color=#ffff00]Featuring:[/color]
- One of the most famous artifacts of Tamriel.
- More than 3 minutes of gameplay.
- [/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Another Nordic dungeon (as if they are so few).
- Original soundtrack that was actually composed for another mod (including boss battle theme).
- Uneasy boss with tragic story (which he described in his diary).
- Eltonbrand-free content.
- Dumpling!

[/size][/font]
[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
author: Ronnie Magnum
